5.12.22  10:42 pm   The "when, where, were, we're" segment of "if the world doesn't end" is one of my favorite moments you've ever written, both lyrically and musically. It sounds great and gives me the feeling of an epiphany when I hear it. How did that come about? And why "when"? Why not "why" or "what"? Something about the sound of "when"?
